message: this would make muted topics not contribute to unread counts, in particular.
+3 ... especially for evilbot in the github group
There are simply tons of discussions I'm not interested in so they just hide the updates that I *am* interested in in the flyout.
Lol, there are also tons of duplicates of this topic, so again, +1 and also +1 on the merge topics feedback topic!
I don't want to go through and mute topics either. think what I want is to be able to follow topics individually, and a 'follow all' button in each group
Perhaps this could be defined by user and group :-)
when you join a group, you already get asked for email preferences. it seems reasonable to also request "Follow topics by default? or manually select?"
mute is better for discovery. Would be good if you could do it from the groups menu, too. Much faster (that's where I go to see my unreads 90% of the time anyway.. I barely use the nav on the left)
